title: Doernbecher Children's Hospital
description: OHSU faculty, community pediatricians, residents, and students are welcome to attend this weekly lecture.
cleaned_text: Pediatric Grand Rounds Pediatric Grand Rounds is the premiere OHSU Department of Pediatrics didactic offering for trainees, clinicians, researchers, and community providers. Our mission is equip attendees to provide the best care for children by fostering curiosity and discussion surrounding complex concepts related to children's health. Pediatric Grand Rounds is held in person with a Webex option for those who want to watch virtually. In compliance with OHSU Visitor Vaccination Guidelines, it is recommended that anyone attending Pediatric Grand Rounds in person be fully vaccinated. Please do not attend if you have an signs of illness. By attending Pediatric Grand Rounds, the attendee agrees to be in compliance with OHSU infection control policies. Time: Thursdays, 8-9 a.m. How to attend: Please refer to weekly emails for viewing option. All Pediatric Grand Rounds will continue to be available via [Webex](https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://ohsu.webex.com/ohsu/j.php?MTID=m83e48eb885456774516a59adacf44075__;!!Mi0JBg!LebyiYBlmqTq_Dz41DLzh1x46dWyBoCZwV7zRNHYEMOywGwdHIgDWmzfVSHKO8_q7IuweFWZgh6WyJiVQ-Y$) or [Livestream](https://echo360.org/section/7571cc8f-2e17-4e57-88a5-d8cfd2b5b316/public). To receive CME credit: Please complete the evaluation sent out after the session. If you are not on our mailing list and would like CME credit for sessions you attend via WebEx or livestream, please email [Jessica Willhite](mailto:willhitj@ohsu.edu). Recordings of previous sessions: Recordings can be accessed via Echo 360 at: [https://echo360.org/section/7571cc8f-2e17-4e57-88a5-d8cfd2b5b316/public](https://echo360.org/section/7571cc8f-2e17-4e57-88a5-d8cfd2b5b316/public) (note: please use this exact URL if sharing the link; the URL will change once opened in a web browser).
